short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn spanish with spanishdict.com & verbix.com. Create Obsidian.md notes and CSV files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Enanito: Your Companion for Learning Spanish!

Please note that Enanito is an independent extension and is not affiliated neither with Verbix.com nor with SpanishDict.com.

Designed with learners in mind, this handy extension was personally developed by me to enhance my own Spanish learning journey.

With Enanito, you can easily export selected content from the Verbix.com or SpanishDict.com websites to a CSV format (tab separated) or Obsidian.md files, making it much more convenient for you to work with or print out the information you need.

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to reach out to me on Twitter @dweorh. Your feedback is highly appreciated!

Experience the power of Enanito and take your Spanish learning to new heights. Get started today!

# Release notes
* 0.5.4
- fetch() urls for spanishdict.com fix
* 0.5.3
- added support for SpanishDict.com
- added export to Obsidian.md files
* 0.0.4 (0.5.2)
- Subjunctive mood export added
* 0.0.3
- fix for Spanish characters in the infinitive nominal form
long.es:
Introducing Verbix Export: Your Companion for Learning Spanish!

Please note that Verbix Export is an independent extension and is not affiliated with Verbix.com.

Designed with learners in mind, this handy extension was personally developed by me to enhance my own Spanish learning journey.

With Verbix Export, you can easily export selected content from the Verbix.com website to a CSV format (tab separated), making it much more convenient for you to work with or print out the information you need.

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to reach out to me on Twitter @dweorh. Your feedback is highly appreciated!

Experience the power of Verbix Export and take your Spanish learning to new heights. Get started today!

# Release notes
* 0.0.4
- Subjunctive mood export added
* 0.0.3
- fix for Spanish characters in the infinitive nominal form
